name: qodors
tagline: A Leading Mobile and Web App Development Company
description:
Qodors is one of the best mobile application development companies based in India. With more than 5 years of participation in technology space, we have crossed various milestones in creating out of the box apps. We help you to make stunning online presence for your esteemed brand and assure to deliver scalable outcomes for your audience.
Team at Qodors is highly-experienced and skillful with their work approach. We are a family of supremely talented people which includes; engineers, designers, developers, technical experts, content creators and more. We believe in discovering insightful things before putting a layout on the table and we plan various steps in making products. Our aim is to deliver effective products by integrating advanced tools of technology and assure you to serve best outcomes for your valuable investment in technology.
It will be great to hear from you! Let us know your thoughts! We welcome you to have a dialogue with us regarding your projects and requirements.
Moreover, please visit our website www.qodors.com and know more about our stuff.
 
We provide solutions like :
Mobile App Design & Development
Custom Software Development
Web Application Development
Scalable eCommerce & Retail 
Website / Branding / Conversion Optimization
Enterprise Content Management System
Cloud Deployment & Maintenance
Quality Assurance & testing
Staff Augmentation / Offshore Dedicated Team
READ MORE...
